content: “I say I want to stop, but honestly? I don’t.Now what?” It’s all modeling, aka thoughts. Stop them. Divert them. Replace them with other repetitions. You’re the maestro of the piece called you. Glare at the unruly horn section and encourage more from the woodwinds. Whatever it takes. This is an important piece and performance thereof. Grab it by the baton. And, by the way, bravo!
